Title: Peering Into the Past
Description:
Just a moment, now. Allow me to gather my things.

Wouldn't want me to lose these notes now, would we? Especially after you risked life and limb for them!

There, all set. Let us be off, shall we?

I must say, I feel much safer traveling with you after seeing how you handled that saurok!
ObjectivesText: Speak to Lorewalker Cho at the Circle of Stone.

Objectives.Text: Lorewalker Cho escorted to Circle of Stone
